job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtposition summary what youll doltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtsenior software engineerltbrgtltbrgtare you passionate about developing cuttingedge technical solutions to enhance the consumerfacing experience as a member of our engineering organization youll be viewed as a subject matter expert who is capable of taking our competencies to the next level the work you do will help us to define a bestinclass user experience while positioning walmart as a cuttingedge company one that puts innovation at the forefrontltbrgtltbrgtthe senior software engineer position is one that calls for a technical expertise which puts the enduser experience at the center youll apply your coding capabilities and distributed systems competencies to the improvement of existing products and the development of new software solutions at an enterprisescaleltbrgtltbrgtyoull sweep us off our feet ifltbrgtltulgtltligtyoure a selfstarter who balances technical thinking with customercentered solutions ltligtltligtyoure passionate about leveraging todays technologies to create bestinclass user experiences ltligtltligtyou are processdriven and have an understanding of todays infrastructure and able to operate with efficiency ltbrgtltligtltulgtyoull make an impact byltbrgtltulgtltligtdeveloping software solutions that impact largescale operations demonstrate a mastery of enterprise level based applications while optimizing todays coding methodologies to create efficient consumercentric solutions ltligtltligtcollaborating with key product leads and fellow engineers to achieve results position yourself as a crossfunctional partner one who understands intradepartmental and enterprise objectives as well as technological constraints and capabilities ltligtltligtbalancing consumer needs with business outcomes prioritize efficiency and operational effectiveness while performing with agility and an understanding of todays consumer ltbrgtltligtltulgtwhat youll doltbrgtltulgtltligtparticipates in medium to largescale projects by reviewing project requirements translating requirements into technical solutions gathering requested information for example design documents product requirements wire frames writing and developing code conducting unit testing communicating status and issues to team members and stakeholders collaborating with project team and cross functional teams troubleshooting open issues and bugfixes ensuring ontime delivery and handoffs interacting with project manager to provide input on project plan and providing leadership to the project teamltligtltligtleads the work of other small groups of four to six engineers including offshore associates for assigned engineering projects by proving pertinent documents direction and examples identifying short and long term solutions and timeline reviewing and providing feedback for proposed solutions and performing design and code reviews of changesltligtltligttroubleshoots business and production issues by gathering information for example issue impact criticality possible root cause engaging support teams to assist in the resolution of issues formulating an action plan performing actions as designated in the plan interpreting the results to determine further action performs root cause analysis to prevent future occurrence of issues and completing online documentationltbrgtltligtltulgtwhat youll bringltulgtltligtspecialization in one of the followingltligtltulgtltligtfront end positions javascript html css react angularjs vueltligtltligtfull stack positions java javascript python nodejsltligtltligtbackend positions java spring springboot hibernate restsoapltligtltligtmobile positions kotlin swift javascript react nativeltligtltulgtltligtexperience with modern unit testing frameworks eg mocha chailtligtltligtexperiences with building microservicesltligtltligtwell versed in both private and public cloud technologiesltligtltligtdeep understanding of architecture and datadriven developmentltligtltligtability to work with designers to develop dynamic user experiencesltligtltligta strong sense of ownershipltligtltligtexperience building or maintaining a production applicationltligtltligtan ability to balance a sense of urgency with shipping high quality and pragmatic solutionsltligtltligtexperience working with a large codebase on a cross functional teamltligtltligtinterest or experience in building large scalable systemsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtabout global techltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtimagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face thats what we do at walmart global tech were a team of software engineers data scientists and service professionals within walmart the worlds largest retailer delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our million associates to others innovation looks like an app service or some code but walmart has always been about people people are why we innovate and people power our innovations ltemgtbeing humanled is our true disruptionltbrgtltbrgtltemgtwere virtualltbrgtltbrgtworking virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions remove location barriers across our global team be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting today we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team of course being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success well collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purposeltbrgtltbrgtwalmart inc is an equal opportunity employer by choice we believe we are best equipped to help our associates customers and the communities we serve live better when we really know them that means understanding respecting and valuing diversity unique styles experiences identities ideas and opinions while being inclusive of all peopleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtminimum qualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltemgtltemgtoutlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position if none are listed there are no minimum qualifications ltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltemgtbachelors degree in computer science and years experience
